titleStmt.title: Here begynneth thystorye of ye vii. wyse maysters of Rome conteynynge ryghe fayre [et] right ioyous narrac[i]ons. [et] to ye reder ryght delectable.
History of the seven wise masters of Rome. English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Enprented in flete strete in ye sygne of the sone, by me Wynkyn de Worde,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: flete strete in ye sygne of the sone
